title: Hold Monster
content:
Hold Monster Level 5 Enchantment Spell Paralyse a creature. It can't move, act or react. Attacks from within 3m are always Critical Hits. 10 turns No effect on undead. 18m WIS Save Concentration Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Level 5 Enchantment Spell

Paralyse a creature. It can't move, act or react. Attacks from within 3m are always Critical Hits.

No effect on undead.

18m WIS Save Concentration

Hold Monster is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Hold Monster is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Enchantment school
